titleStmt.title: An holsome antidotus or counter-poysen, agaynst the pestylent heresye and secte of the Anabaptistes newly translated out of lati[n] into Englysh by Iohn Veron, Senonoys
titleStmt.author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
Véron, John, d. 1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holburne Conduit,

notesStmt.note: A translation of a Latin translation of an unidentified work in German by Heinrich Bullinger.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
